resources.string: There was an issue with login, please retry later.
Failed to sign in. Please check your network connection and try again.

The application is incorrectly configured. Check that the package name and signing certificate match the client ID created in Developer Console. Also, if the application is not yet published, check that the account you are trying to sign in with is listed as a tester account. See logs for more information.
Sorry, but the connection to the game has been lost. Did another player leave the game?
Sorry, but there seems to be a problem with your network connection, please retry later!
When blue and yellow overlap they turn green
Only green lines disappear, so work together!

This app was developed as part of the Android Challenge: one app every month for one year (think of it as a New Year\'s resolution). Team Blocks is our project for May.

If you want to know more be sure to check out our website. This app is open source and you can find everything on GitHub.

We would love to hear from you! Send us an email and let us know what you think!

The developers are

Philipp Eichhorn
Simon Hofmann
Julia Schottenhamml
Richard Baumann

Happy coding!

This app is being powered by a number of small and large open source projects which all together have made this project happen. We couldn\'t have done this without them. To those fellow developers out there spending their part time creating those libraries: you guys are awesome, keep on rocking!

The libraries in use are:

Timber by Jake Wharton
RoboGuice
Google Play Services by Google Inc.
Android Open Source Project by Google Inc. and the Open Handset Alliance


Thanks everyone!

We would love to hear from you!

Team Blocks is still in a very early stage and we need your help to determine if you enjoyed the app or what improvements need to be done.

So please consider heading over to the PlayStore and let uns know what you think!
